title: Do Principalities Have Will and Perception? | Clip from September Patreon Q&A
description:
Following my discussion on Santa Claus and principalities, a patron asks if beings like Santa have means of perception and will.

This clip was taken from the live September Patreon Q&A for patrons. 

The original videos - 

Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy Exist
https://youtu.be/fXnef2Ltklg

The Problem With Monotheism
https://youtu.be/iSjHVN8Ziv4

My links:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
